data.message: You should keep politics out of your music just like it should be left out of the NFL.  I use to be a fan but this kinda broke the camels back. You sound like Hilary Clinton and that's pathetic!

replies.message: Meh, i mean... This isn't the first time he brought politics into his rap. He straight up destroyed Bush and he was under investigation a decade back for a line about dead presidents. And as for hillary clinton... Oh come on, we supposed to be done with that trash, not complimenting her with the comparison to someone who used to dominate the hip hop industry
As far as I'm concerned they are all trash! And a comparison to Hilary is actually a compliment to Eminem, she is and always will be trash.
Athletes and musicians have been expressing their political views forever. Deal with it. ❄️
